name: Vachtar Reoite
description:
Vachtar Reoite

(named because the colour scheme looks vaguely ice-cream -esque)

This is a (very) short puzzle game I built when learning some Unity development basics. There's room for future development, better designed levels, adding health pick ups, etc. I may come back and update it in the future but for now I'm trying to 'complete' a game a week so I'm uploading it as is.

Controls: 

Move: WASD

Restart Level (necessary if you die): R

Credits:

Art: fisherg.itch.io/micro-asset-pack

Music: chiptunistchippy.itch.io/chippy-music-pack

Sound Effects: u-gamez.itch.io/error-boy-sound-pack

Font: somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
